original_text: As the ark of the covenant of the Lord was entering the City of David, Michal daughter of Saul watched from a window. And when she saw King David dancing and celebrating, she despised him in her heart.
korean_text: 여호와의 언약궤가 다윗 성으로 들어올 때에 사울의 딸 미갈이 창으로 내다보다가 다윗 왕이 춤추며 뛰노는 것을 보고 그 마음에 업신여겼더라

sentences.original_text: As the ark of the covenant of the Lord
was entering the City of David
And when she saw King David
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 다윗 왕을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: she despised him in her heart
